languages.text: "Пожелал лично с губернатором переговорить, пришлось четверть солдат с ним отправить, чтобы не стряслось чего".
"He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."
languages.original_text: "Пожелал лично с губернатором переговорить, пришлось четверть солдат с ним отправить, чтобы не стряслось чего".

traits.locale_text: "He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep him out of trouble."
"He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep him out of trouble."
"He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."
"He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."
"He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."
"He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."

languages.text: "Er hat verlangt, persönlich mit dem Gouverneur zu sprechen, daher musste ich ein Viertel meiner Truppen als Eskorte mit ihm mitschicken."
languages.original_text: "He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat verlangt, persönlich mit dem Gouverneur zu sprechen, daher musste ich ein Viertel meiner Truppen als Eskorte mit ihm mitschicken."

languages.text: « Il a demandé à parler personnellement au gouverneur, et j'ai dû envoyer un quart de mes troupes pour éviter qu'il lui arrive malheur. »
languages.original_text: "He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."

traits.locale_text: « Il a demandé à parler personnellement au gouverneur, et j'ai dû envoyer un quart de mes troupes pour éviter qu'il lui arrive malheur. »

languages.text: “他要求亲自与总督见面，所以我不得不把四分之一的部队派出去护送他，以免他在路上遇到麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."

traits.locale_text: “他要求亲自与总督见面，所以我不得不把四分之一的部队派出去护送他，以免他在路上遇到麻烦。”

languages.text: 「彼は総督と個人的に話をすることを要求したので、トラブルを抑えようと部隊の4分の1を彼と一緒に送ることになりました」
languages.original_text: "He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は総督と個人的に話をすることを要求したので、トラブルを抑えるようと部隊の4分の1を彼と一緒に送ることになりました」

languages.text: «Exigió hablar personalmente con el gobernador, así que tuve que enviar a una cuarta parte de mis tropas con él para que no hubiese problemas».
languages.original_text: "He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."

traits.locale_text: «Exigió hablar personalmente con el gobernador, así que tuve que enviar a una cuarta parte de mis tropas con él para que no hubiese problemas».

languages.text: "Valiyle şahsen görüşme talep etti, ben de belaya bulaşmasın diye askerlerimin çeyreğini onunla göndermek zorunda kaldım."
languages.original_text: "He demanded to talk to the governor personally, so I had to send a quarter of my troops with him to keep trouble at bay."

traits.locale_text: "Valiyle şahsen görüşme talep etti, ben de belaya bulaşmasın diye askerlerimin çeyreğini onunla göndermek zorunda kaldım."
